conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model clearly demonstrates height, thickness, depth, an angled view, and the roof is removed to show the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness. Floors are clearly separate planes. Interior volume is well perceivable. 3D wall corner geometry is mostly good, though some stair areas are simplified. The viewing angle is excellent. Interior is visible from an elevated perspective. Minimal perspective distortion. Roof is cleanly removed, and interior spaces are fully visible. Geometry is clean with no broken sections.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Most room configurations are accurate. The number of rooms might seem slightly off due to how the 'Central Hall' is defined in 2D vs. the open layout in 3D, but major adjacencies are preserved. Relative room proportions are largely preserved. Major wall positions align well. Wall lengths are proportional. Internal partitions are mostly correct, though the 'Alcove' area and some storage next to the stairs are simplified. Doors are present and on correct walls. Windows are present and generally on correct walls, though some window types differ (e.g., the large window seat area). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present in the kitchen/dining/living areas (kitchen island, fridge, sink, stove, sofa). Bathroom fixtures are present (toilet, sink). Kitchen elements are present and well-represented. Furniture is mostly placed in correct rooms with reasonable scale and logical orientation. The laundry appliances are missing from the utility room, and the 'WH' in the utility room is not represented. The Alcove has a table, but the 2D does not clearly indicate furniture for that spot. The dining room furniture is missing.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. Geometry is readable and not confusing. Interior is clearly visible with good lighting that does not obscure geometry. Consistent material usage. No major rendering artifacts or broken meshes. The background is clean and aids presentation.

detected_errors.description: Missing laundry appliances in utility room. Missing dining room furniture.
Simplification of the 'Alcove' area and some storage/cabinetry near the stairs.

summary: The 3D conversion is an excellent, geometrically faithful representation of the 2D floor plan, demonstrating clear 3D transformation and high layout accuracy with minor omissions in interior elements and some simplification in intricate architectural features.
